extension.name: ZLabel
extension.description: It allows to model a new label widget model.

methods.name: New
methods.description: Adds a new ZLabel model to the model layout of the RecyclerView which is synced.

methods.name: BuildProps
methods.description: Returns a new property set containing the previously defined properties.

methods.name: SetFontTypeface
methods.description:
Changes the font of the widget.
**Info:**
>Using this method instead of defining the font in the widget model may cause significant performance losses.

methods.name: SetFontSize
methods.description: Changes the font size of the widget.

methods.name: SetMaxLines
methods.description: This method changes the maximum number of lines that the widget will have.

methods.name: SetMinLines
methods.description: This method changes the minimum number of lines that the widget will have.

methods.name: SetJustify
methods.description: This method changes the justification of the widget text.

methods.name: SetTextAlign
methods.description: This method changes the alignment of the text.

methods.name: SetTextColor
methods.description: This method changes the color of the text.

methods.name: SetMarquee
methods.description: Changes the state of the widget's moving text.

methods.name: SetText
methods.description: Changes the text of the widget.

properties.name: FontTypeface
properties.description:
Specifies the font of the text.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: FontSize
properties.description:
Specifies the size of the text.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Bold
properties.description:
Specifies whether the text will be bold.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Italic
properties.description:
Specifies whether the text will be italic.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: MaxLines
properties.description:
Specifies the maximum lines of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: MinLines
properties.description:
Specifies the minimum lines of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Justify
properties.description:
Specifies whether the text will be justified.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: TextAlign
properties.description:
Specifies the alignment of the text.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: TextColor
properties.description:
Specifies the color of the text.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Marquee
properties.description:
Specifies whether the text will be in motion.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>For the text to move, it has to exceed the size of the widget.

properties.name: Text
properties.description:
Specifies the default text for the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>If the text will not change there is no reason to use the SetText method.

properties.name: MaxWidth
properties.description:
Specifies the maximum width that the widget can reach.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: MaxHeight
properties.description:
Specifies the maximum height that the widget can reach.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: HtmlSupport
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget should handle the text in HTML format.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Background
properties.description:
Specifies the background of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Elevation
properties.description:
Specifies the elevation of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>The widget displays a shadow according to its elevation.
>In order for the shadow to be displayed, the widget must have a non-transparent background.

properties.name: LayoutMetrics
properties.description:
Specifies the set of properties that the parent of the widget will take to create the widget's measures.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingLeft
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the left edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingRight
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the right edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingTop
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the top edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingBottom
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the bottom edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Padding
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the edges and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget is enabled.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Visible
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget is visible (true) or invisible (false).
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>Being invisible, it does not occupy any space.

properties.name: Clickable
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget can be clicked.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: LongClickable
properties.description:
Specifies if the widget can be long clicked.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Alpha
properties.description:
Specifies the opacity of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>Range from 0.0 (0% visible) to 1.0 (100% visible)

properties.name: AlignStart
properties.description:
Text Alignment
**Block Types:** *Read*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: AlignEnd
properties.description:
Text Alignment
**Block Types:** *Read*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: AlignCenter
properties.description:
Text Alignment
**Block Types:** *Read*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
